question: L'Olympiade de la République, was a national Olympic festival held annually from 1796 to 1798 and was an attempt to emulate ancient Olympic Games, in which country?
explanation: L'Olympiade de la République, was a national Olympic festival held annually from 1796 to 1798 and was an attempt to emulate ancient Olympic Games was held in Revolutionary France. It included many disciplines from the ancient Greek Olympics.
